channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China’s Threat to the World Economy
item.description: This week’s Chinese trade numbers can leave little doubt that the country’s trade surplus is unsustainable.

item.title: Fed’s Powell voices fear of K-shaped economy: ‘How sustainable it is, I don’t know’
item.description: Powell said most consumer consumption comes from the rich. "The top third accounts for way more than a third of the consumption ... So it’s a good que...

item.title: Hinge’s founder and CEO is stepping down to start a new AI-first dating app
item.description: The new venture will use AI “to help people connect in a more thoughtful and personal way.”

item.title: It’s the Incentives, Stupid
item.description: From college kids with ‘disabilities’ to the Minnesota fraudsters, we see the results when society or government confers benefits on certain groups or...

item.title: Doha Is the New Paris
item.description: Tucker Carlson finds an alluring alternative to the United States.

item.title: US–Venezuela showdown threatens to jolt gas prices — what could spark a surge
item.description: As President Donald Trump's drug campaign targets Venezuela, potential land strikes raise concerns about oil market disruption and higher energy price...

item.title: Trump’s Ominous Decision to Sell Advanced Chips to China
item.description: The Nvidia deal could help China beat us in the AI race.

item.title: AOC’s campaign pours massive cash into luxury Puerto Rico hotels, pricey catering and Bad Bunny venue rental
item.description: AOC criticized gentrification during a Puerto Rico visit in August even as recent campaign docs show she stayed at upscale hotels, ate pricey food and...

item.title: House Dem to force Trump impeachment vote on 2 articles
item.description: Rep. Al Green forced the House vote on Trump impeachment this week, citing threats against House lawmakers and members of the judiciary.

item.title: GOP accuses Democrats of manufacturing affordability crisis as Obamacare subsidy fight nears deadline
item.description: Senate Democrats have warned a looming healthcare affordability crisis as Biden-era healthcare subsidies are set to expire, but Republicans charge tha...

item.title: ComfortDelGro joins Singapore’s race for autonomous vehicles with new shuttle trials and public rides by 2026
item.description: Both ComfortDelGro and ride-hailing platform Grab plan to roll out AVs to the public by next year.

item.title: Newsom trolls White House with AI video depicting Trump, Hegseth and Miller in handcuffs
item.description: Democratic Golden State Gov. Gavin Newsom trolled the Trump White House with an apparently AI-generated video depicting the president, Pete Hegseth, a...

item.title: ‘We have not seen this rosy picture’: ADP’s chief economist warns the real economy is pretty different from Wall Street’s bullish outlook
item.description: "We're tracking changes in real time, it's as high frequency as payroll data [can] get and we have not seen this rosy picture for 2026 in the data," A...

item.title: Cursor has growing revenue and a $29 billion valuation—but CEO Michael Truell isn’t thinking about an IPO
item.description: CEO Michael Truell says the AI coding startup hit $1 billion in annualized revenue last month—but it's focused on building features, not going public.

item.title: On Obamacare, Trump Already Showed Republicans the Way
item.description: Senate Republicans should quit trying to expand it.

item.title: Documents: Wisconsin Judge In Trump Electors Case Didn’t Write His Own Ruling
item.description: Unsealed documents accuse retired Dane County Judge Frank Remington of ghostwriting Judge John Hyland's order rejecting a dismissal motion.

item.title: Trump's tariffs spur government's improving deficit
item.description: The deficit has ticked down in the new fiscal year, and analysts said there's one obvious reason for the improvement: President Trump's tariffs.

item.title: FDA Head Makary Commits To Releasing ‘Robust’ Abortion Pill Review As Soon As It Is Completed
item.description: The FDA’s study, Makary announced, is even ‘bigger’ and ‘more robust’ than previous mifepristone examinations.

item.title: Campaign Finance And The First Amendment Take Center Stage At SCOTUS
item.description: In NRSC v. FEC, the court will decide the constitutionality of restrictions on coordinated spending between candidates and political parties.

item.title: Trump hails American business environment for U.S. entrepeneurs

item.title: ‘Gold-Standard’ Immigration Enforcement Bill Lagging In Indiana As Redistricting Sucks Oxygen
item.description: While Indiana's congressional redistricting efforts generate massive attention, an immigration bill the Trump administration supports is lagging.
